sources.title: Feud Maker, The
sources.description: Tex is brought in to help fight in a range war between the cowmen and the nesters. As he tries to reach a peaceable end to the conflict, he learns that his old nemesis may be behind the feud. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page . The MPEG-4 files have been re-derived and should work with a video iPod.

sources.title: The Feud Maker (1938) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Marion Weldon, Karl Hackett 
Director: Sam Newfield

When Tex is brought in to fight in a range war between the cowmen and the nesters, he meets his old outlaw boss Lassiter. He learns Lassiter is behind the feud when Lassiter asks him to join up with his gang. Tex refuses and instead sets out to stop the feud but no one will believe him that Lassiter is responsible.

metadata.Plot: When Tex is brought in to fight in a range war between the cowmen and the nesters, he meets his old outlaw boss Lassiter. He learns Lassiter is behind the feud when Lassiter asks him to join up with his gang. Tex refuses and instead sets out to stop the feud but no one will believe him that Lassiter is responsible.
metadata.Writer: Harry F. Olmsted, George H. Plympton
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Marion Weldon, Karl Hackett
